Text: Candlestick Nat gasMorning Nat Gas opened about halfway down the bullish candle of yesterday This is not the confirmation that would be expected to confirm the Bullish Engulfing signal A close today below the close of yesterday would indicate that if the trend is up it will be weak If todays close is near the opening price or below watch for further weakness Steve
